preparation.raw_text:
1. Weigh out precise amounts of aluminum (8 g), erbium (1 g), and terbium (3 g) using a digital scale. 
 2. Place the aluminum in a clean, dry mixing container. 
 3. Slowly add erbium and terbium to the aluminum while stirring gently to ensure uniform distribution of the powders. 
 4. Continue mixing until all materials are evenly combined, creating a homogenous mixture.
